keywords: Deformation, Ecosystems Structure and Dynamics of Ice. (DESDynI)
title: Instrument Concept for the Proposed DESDynI SAR instrument

organization.name: Jet Propulsion Lab., California Inst. of Tech.
Jet Propulsion Lab., California Inst. of Tech.
Jet Propulsion Lab., California Inst. of Tech.

abstract: The proposed DESDynI (Solid Earth Deformation, Ecosystems Structure and Dynamics of Ice) SAR (synthetic aperture radar) Instrument would expand the trade-space of radar instrument concepts and push the boundaries of high-level integration of digital and RF subsystems in order to achieve very precise assessments of system's behavior; DESDynI mission concept would provide continuous science measurements that would greatly enhance understanding of geophysical and anthropological effects in three science disciplines; Trades in instrument architecture implementations and partnership discussions are producing a set of options for science community and NASA to evaluate and consider implementing late in the decade.

meetings.name: Radar 2012 International Conference on Radar Systems
